resources.string: Thank you for installing ShareWiFi Alpha.
ShareWiFi enables you to share Wi-Fi credentials. The app connects your device automatically.
You can also share Wi-Fi credentials with others. The key keeps invisible.
You can always undo a share.
Currently this app is only a UI preview. You cannot share something until now. Updates will bring the full functionality step by step.
The info tour explains how ShareWiFi works.
You must login to use ShareWiFi. This allows other users to share something with you.
